description: The CowboyStudio 2275 Watt Digital Video Continuous Softbox Lighting Kit/Boom Set is used in the studio to provide any form of lighting above the subject. This product is particularly effective as a hair light or back light, which breaks up the subject from the background.One of the main questions are customers ask us is “what is the difference between continuous and strobe lighting?” Continuous lighting uses a constant light source to light your subject, meaning that your lights will stay on during the entirety of your photo shoot. Continuous lighting is recommended for beginners. Strobe lighting uses a flash of light at the moment your camera shutter opens to illuminate your subject. Many professionals use this type of lighting because it offers more control of the light.Light Stand:Versatile, Hardworking & LightweightBlack anodized aluminumMax Height: 6.7 Ft, Min Height: 26inStable & Quick SetupPhoto Bulb:45 watt fluorescent light bulb = 200 watt Incandescent light bulbs each with a day light balanced color temperature of 5000K.  The total output for the main lights is 2000 Watt. These high-output daylight balanced compact fluorescent bulbs are ideally suited for digital photography. They also have very low heat so they don't get hot like the more common photo bulb choices.Light Socket:It mounts on standard light stands. You can control each of the light bulbs on/off.  The kit has dedicated softboxes with the speedring built right into the light socket.Boom Kit:Solid quick release lever, fully adjustableMax fully extended height is 7 feet with a 5/8in stem, 26in foot print, 42in min height, 40in when close, max load is 16 lbBoom arm telescope extend to 5.6 ftScrew on tip is 1/4inQuick set-up softbox that is easily set-up and broken down
title: CowboyStudio 2275 Watt Digital Video Continuous Softbox Lighting Kit/Boom Set
